mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BUSINESS( BUSINESS_NO, USER_NO, BUSINESS_REGIST_NO, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_CATEGORY_NO, BUSINESS_ADDRESS_ROAD, BUSINESS_ADDRESS_DETAIL, BUSINESS_ZIP_CODE, BUSINESS_PHONE, BUSINESS_REGIST_DATE, BUSINESS_UPDATE_DATE, BUSINESS_STATUS )VALUES( NULL, #{userNo}, #{businessRegistNo}, #{businessName}, #{businessCategoryNo}, #{businessAddressRoad}, #{businessAddressDetail}, #{businessZipCode}, #{businessPhone}, #{businessRegistDate}, #{businessUpdateDate}, #{businessStatus} )

INSERT INTO TBL_ROOM( ROOM_NO, BUSINESS_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_INTRO, ROOM_DETAIL, ROOM_AVAILABLE_STATUS, ROOM_MIN_PEOPLE, ROOM_MAX_PEOPLE, ROOM_FACILITY_INFO, ROOM_NOTICE, ROOM_REGIST_DATE, ROOM_STATUS, ROOM_PRICE )VALUES( NULL, #{businessNo}, #{roomName}, #{roomIntro}, #{roomDetail}, #{roomAvailableStatus}, #{roomMinPeople}, #{roomMaxPeople}, #{roomFacilityInfo}, #{roomNotice}, #{roomRegistDate}, #{roomStatus}, #{price} )

INSERT INTO TBL_CLOSED_DAY ( CLOSED_DAY_NO, CLOSED_DAY, BUSINESS_NO ) VALUES
( NULL, #{item.closedDay}, #{item.businessNo} )

INSERT INTO TBL_HOLIDAY ( HOLIDAY_NO, BUSINESS_NO, HOLIDAY_NAME, HOLIDAY_REASON, HOLIDAY_START_DATE, HOLIDAY_END_DATE, HOLIDAY_REGIST_DATE, HOLIDAY_STATUS ) VALUES
( NULL, #{item.businessNo}, #{item.holidayName}, #{item.reason}, #{item.startDate}, #{item.endDate}, #{item.registDate}, #{item.activeStatus} )

INSERT INTO TBL_TIME_UNIT_SCHEDULE ( TIME_UNIT_SCHEDULE_NO, BUSINESS_NO, START_TIME_IDX, END_TIME_IDX ) VALUES
( NULL, #{timeUnit.businessNo}, #{timeUnit.startTime}, #{timeUnit.endTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT BUSINESS_CATEGORY_NO, BUSINESS_CATEGORY_NAME, BUSINESS_CATEGORY_COLOR_CODE FROM TBL_BUSINESS_CATEGORY WHERE BUSINESS_CATEGORY_STATUS = 'active'

SELECT BUSINESS_NO, USER_NO, BUSINESS_REGIST_NO, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_CATEGORY_NO, BUSINESS_ADDRESS_ROAD, BUSINESS_ADDRESS_DETAIL, BUSINESS_ZIP_CODE, BUSINESS_PHONE, BUSINESS_REGIST_DATE, BUSINESS_UPDATE_DATE, BUSINESS_STATUS FROM TBL_BUSINESS WHERE USER_NO = #{ownerNo} AND BUSINESS_STATUS = 'active'
SELECT A.ROOM_NO, A.APPLIED_OPTION_NO, B.OPTION_NAME FROM TBL_APPLIED_OPTION AS A JOIN TBL_ROOM_OPTION AS B ON (A.APPLIED_OPTION_NO = B.OPTION_NO) WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
SELECT CLOSED_DAY_NO, BUSINESS_NO, CLOSED_DAY FROM TBL_CLOSED_DAY WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo}

SELECT DISTINCT ROOM_NO, BUSINESS_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_INTRO, ROOM_DETAIL, ROOM_AVAILABLE_STATUS, ROOM_MIN_PEOPLE, ROOM_MAX_PEOPLE, ROOM_FACILITY_INFO, ROOM_NOTICE, ROOM_REGIST_DATE, ROOM_UPDATE_DATE, ROOM_STATUS, ROOM_PRICE FROM TBL_ROOM WHERE ROOM_STATUS = 'active'

SELECT ROOM_NO, BUSINESS_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_INTRO, ROOM_DETAIL, ROOM_AVAILABLE_STATUS, ROOM_MIN_PEOPLE, ROOM_MAX_PEOPLE, ROOM_FACILITY_INFO, ROOM_NOTICE, ROOM_REGIST_DATE, ROOM_UPDATE_DATE, ROOM_STATUS, ROOM_PRICE FROM TBL_ROOM WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessIdx} AND ROOM_STATUS = 'active'

SELECT ROOM_NO, BUSINESS_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_INTRO, ROOM_DETAIL, ROOM_AVAILABLE_STATUS, ROOM_MIN_PEOPLE, ROOM_MAX_PEOPLE, ROOM_FACILITY_INFO, ROOM_NOTICE, ROOM_REGIST_DATE, ROOM_UPDATE_DATE, ROOM_STATUS, ROOM_PRICE FROM TBL_ROOM WHERE BUSINESS_NO IN ( SELECT A.BUSINESS_NO FROM TBL_BUSINESS AS A JOIN TBL_BUSINESS_CATEGORY AS B ON (A.BUSINESS_CATEGORY_NO = B.BUSINESS_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE B.BUSINESS_CATEGORY_NAME = #{businessCategoryName} ) AND ROOM_STATUS = 'active'

SELECT DISTINCT ROOM_NO, BUSINESS_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_INTRO, ROOM_DETAIL, ROOM_AVAILABLE_STATUS, ROOM_MIN_PEOPLE, ROOM_MAX_PEOPLE, ROOM_FACILITY_INFO, ROOM_NOTICE, ROOM_REGIST_DATE, ROOM_UPDATE_DATE, ROOM_STATUS, ROOM_PRICE FROM TBL_ROOM WHERE ROOM_STATUS = 'active' AND ( ROOM_NAME LIKE #{keyWordRoomName} OR ROOM_INTRO LIKE #{keyWordRoomIntro} OR ROOM_DETAIL LIKE #{keyWordRoomDetail} OR ROOM_FACILITY_INFO LIKE #{keyWordRoomFacilityInfo} OR ROOM_NOTICE LIKE #{keyWordRoomNotice} OR BUSINESS_NO IN ( SELECT BUSINESS_NO FROM TBL_BUSINESS WHERE BUSINESS_NAME LIKE #{keyWordBusinessName} OR BUSINESS_ADDRESS_ROAD LIKE #{keyWordAddressRoad} ) )

SELECT BUSINESS_NO, USER_NO, BUSINESS_REGIST_NO, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_CATEGORY_NO, BUSINESS_ADDRESS_ROAD, BUSINESS_ADDRESS_DETAIL, BUSINESS_ZIP_CODE, BUSINESS_PHONE, BUSINESS_REGIST_DATE, BUSINESS_UPDATE_DATE, BUSINESS_STATUS FROM TBL_BUSINESS WHERE BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo}

SELECT ROOM_NO, BUSINESS_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_INTRO, ROOM_DETAIL, ROOM_AVAILABLE_STATUS, ROOM_MIN_PEOPLE, ROOM_MAX_PEOPLE, ROOM_FACILITY_INFO, ROOM_NOTICE, ROOM_REGIST_DATE, ROOM_STATUS, ROOM_PRICE FROM TBL_ROOM WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND ROOM_STATUS = 'active'

SELECT A.BUSINESS_NO, USER_NO, BUSINESS_REGIST_NO, BUSINESS_NAME, BUSINESS_CATEGORY_NO, BUSINESS_ADDRESS_ROAD, BUSINESS_ADDRESS_DETAIL, BUSINESS_ZIP_CODE, BUSINESS_PHONE, BUSINESS_REGIST_DATE, BUSINESS_UPDATE_DATE, BUSINESS_STATUS FROM TBL_BUSINESS AS A JOIN TBL_ROOM AS B ON (A.BUSINESS_NO = B.BUSINESS_NO) WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
